backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, user profiles, builder sessions, and opportunity storage with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a homepage hero text adjustment to its source file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with brief descriptions of each component and page.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: App layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, and footer wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/auth/BuilderLogi: Shows a login screen using Internet Identity with descriptions and a button to authenticate.
frontend/src/components/BrowseFiltersBar: Filter bar component providing controls for location, category, barrier level, and sort mode.
frontend/src/components/builder/BuilderS: Provides the main layout for the builder interface, including sessions panel, transcript, and composer areas.
frontend/src/components/builder/ChatComp: Textarea and send button component that handles message submission with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/builder/ChatTran: Renders chat messages with avatars, autoâ€‘scrolling, loading skeletons, and an empty-state prompt.
frontend/src/components/builder/ProfileS: Dialog prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/builder/Sessions: Sidebar listing builder sessions with controls to create and select sessions.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedOpportun: Displays featured opportunities with loading, error, and empty states using OpportunityCard.
Displays an opportunity card with title, badges, score, and actions to view details or open an external link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilderMessages.ts: Fetches and appends builder chat messages for a session using React Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilderSessions.ts: Loads the user's builder sessions and provides a mutation to create new sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves and saves the current user's profile via the backend actor with React Query state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureXerisFeature: Ensures a specific featured opportunity exists by calling the backend once and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeaturedOpportunit: Fetches featured opportunities using react-query and an actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identity, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunities.ts: Retrieves filtered opportunities list via react-query with remote, category, and barrier options.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunity.ts: Fetches a single opportunity by ID using the actor and react-query.
Submits a new opportunity and invalidates related react-query caches on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration with theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details and feature descriptions using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Displays browsable opportunities with filters, sorting, featured section, and URL-synced search params.
frontend/src/pages/BuilderPage.tsx: Manages the builder chat interface with identity gating, session handling, messaging, and profile setup.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature highlights, and navigation buttons for the app builder and browsing opportunities.
frontend/src/pages/OpportunityDetailsPag: Displays detailed information about a specific opportunity with loading, error handling, and navigation back to browsing.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitOpportunityPage: Form page allowing users to submit a new opportunity with validation, error display, and submission handling.
frontend/src/utils/builderAssistant.ts: Rule-based generator that creates deterministic app plans by extracting keywords and detecting features from a prompt.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with support for query strings, hash routing, and session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON describing project metadata, rebrand goals, and a list of existing implemented features with their requirements. Contains no architectural notes or issues.
